title: Why Logos matters
author: VD
content_html:
Professor Rachel Fulton Brown interviews E. Michael Jones on Unauthorized.

Professor Rachel Fulton Brown sits down with Dr. E. Michael Jones to ask some hard questions about his new book Logos Rising: A History of Ultimate Reality (Fidelity Press, 2020). What is Logos, why is it necessary, how do we discover it, and why is it anathema to the current cultural debate? What is our best evidence that Logos is rising, and where does the Virgin Mary fit in the story?

In other Unauthorized news, we’re now caught up on Wranglerstar, with 40 more of his videos now available on the site. Don’t miss those about his experiences fighting the Antifa fires. And Barcelona Life is back, with yet another Cocina Quarantina special you’re going to want to try!

Unauthorized now features 1,348 videos that comprise 1,426 hours of viewing time. This includes the two latest from WRANGLERSTAR as he battles the Oregon wildfires: “How We Survived the Oregon Wildland Fires” and “How To Protect Yourself From Wildfire Smoke” as well as The Legend Chuck Dixon contemplating the four options presently facing Marvel boss Kevin Feige.

It would take you two straight months just to watch all! One subscriber says: Every one of those videos is worth watching. Not one of those videos promotes the evil, the ugly, or the false. So, if you haven’t subscribed yet, what are you waiting for?
content_text:
Professor Rachel Fulton Brown
interviews E. Michael Jones
on Unauthorized.
Professor Rachel Fulton Brown sits down with Dr. E. Michael Jones to ask some hard questions about his new book
Logos Rising: A History of Ultimate Reality
(Fidelity Press, 2020). What is Logos, why is it necessary, how do we discover it, and why is it anathema to the current cultural debate? What is our best evidence that Logos is rising, and where does the Virgin Mary fit in the story?
In other Unauthorized news, we’re now caught up on

you’re going to want to try!
Unauthorized now features 1,348 videos that comprise 1,426 hours of viewing time. This includes the two latest from WRANGLERSTAR as he battles the Oregon wildfires: “How We Survived the Oregon Wildland Fires” and “How To Protect Yourself From Wildfire Smoke” as well as The Legend Chuck Dixon
contemplating the four options
presently facing Marvel boss Kevin Feige.
It would take you two straight months just to watch all! One subscriber says:
Every one of those videos is worth watching. Not one of those videos promotes the evil, the ugly, or the false.
So, if you haven’t subscribed yet, what are you waiting for?
